sentences.sContent: ...the discrepancy between press and radio reports.
sentences.sCn: …报刊报道与广播报道之间的差异。

remMethod.val: dis(分开) + crep(破裂) + ancy(名词后缀) → 裂开 → 差异

words.tran: 有差异的；相差的；矛盾的

trans.tranCn: 不相符， 不一致， 差异
trans.tranOther: a difference between two amounts, details, reports etc that should be the same
